apps.author: mullvad
apps.name: Mullvad VPN
apps.changeLog:
Here is a list of all changes since last stable release [android/2024.8](https://github.com/mullvad/mullvadvpn-app/releases/tag/android%2F2024.8):

### Added
- Add a new access method: Encrypted DNS Proxy. Encrypted DNS proxy is a way to reach the API via proxies. The access method is enabled by default.

### Changed
- Improve animations so that they look better with predictive back.
- Improve detection and logging of a potential rare in-app purchase limbo state.

### Fixed
- Fix a bug where the Android account expiry notifications would not be updated if the app was running in the background for a long time.
- Fix ANR due to the tokio runtime being blocked by `getaddrinfo` when dropped.

### Security
- Remove alternative stack for fault signal handlers on unix based systems. It was implemented incorrectly and could cause stack overflow and heap memory corruption. Fixes audit issue `MLLVD-CR-24-01`.
- Remove/disable unsafe signal code from fault signal handler on unix based systems. Fixes audit issue `MLLVD-CR-24-02`.

apps.author: bitfireAT
apps.name: DAVx⁵
apps.changeLog:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v4.4.5-ose -->

## What's Changed
### New features
* [Push] Allow UP distributor selection by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1146
### Bug fixes
* Don't show app intro again after recomposition by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1142
* AccountSettings: make enable flag for sync intervals explicit by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1156
* Fixed padding problems with Edge-To-Edge by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1171
* LocalAddressBookStore: return all address books, including orphaned ones by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1168
* Address book accounts: bind to accounts (again) by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1184
### Refactoring
* Extract sync framework interaction to separate class by @sunkup in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1137
* Get rid of Head response cache by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1155
* Use AutomaticSyncManager to manage periodic workers and sync framework by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1157
* [Push] Update specification compliance by @ArnyminerZ in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1151
* `AccountSettings`: one class per migration, tests by @rfc2822 in https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/pull/1181


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bitfireAT/davx5-ose/compare/v4.4.4-ose...v4.4.5-ose

apps.author: TeamNewPipe
apps.name: NewPipe
apps.changeLog:
<sup>This is a minor release made to allow the new APK to be reproducible for F-Droid, see #11754, and see [v0.27.3](https://github.com/TeamNewPipe/NewPipe/releases/tag/v0.27.3) for the previous release notes</sup>

### Improved
- Always allow changing player notification preferences on Android 13+ #11738

### Fixed
- Fix exporting database/subscriptions would not truncate an already existing file, possibly leading to a corrupted export #11745 
- Fix player resuming from start when clicking on a timestamp #11734 

### Development
- Add workflow to build unsigned release APKs reliably #11765

apps.author: nextcloud
apps.name: Nextcloud
apps.changeLog:
## 3.30.6 (December 4, 2024)

- Due to new restrictions imposed by Google, the auto-upload feature will no longer be able to automatically remove uploaded files.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes have been implemented

Minimum: NC 16 Server, Android 7.0 Nougat

For a full list, please see https://github.com/nextcloud/android/milestone/103

apps.author: Julien Veyssier
apps.name: PhoneTrack
apps.changeLog:
# Change Log
All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](http://keepachangelog.com/)
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](http://semver.org/).

## [Unreleased]
## 0.1.0 – 2020-06-25
### Changed
- apply new design (like NC Notes and NC Files)
[#206](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-android/issues/206) @stefan-niedermann

## 0.0.19 – 2020-06-22
### Added
- ability to import MapsForge files from anywhere and store them in app data
- display device history in map (local+remote data), able to toggle and filter history
[#199](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-android/issues/199) [#134](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-android/issues/134) @tgc12 @Valdnet
- option to be able to rotate the map
- export local logjob points to GPX

### Changed
- update OsmDroid to 6.1.6 which fixes display bug and brings MapsForge v5 compat
[#183](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-android/issues/183) @Valdnet
- improve main sidebar layout
- display NC account avatar in sidebar
- use color gradient everywhere
- remove 'read contacts' permission finally not necessary for SSO
- update SSO lib to 0.5.1

### Fixed
- fix logging with keepGpsOn which was stopped after getting the first point
[#197](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-android/issues/197) @DavidMndz @huste
- get rid of takisoft stuff and fix some resources to be able to update gradle
- map sidebar display with lots of devices
- keep map sidebar device list scroll state on data update

## 0.0.18 – 2020-04-13
### Added
- system to fix buggy GPS chips time results
[!10](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-android/-/merge_requests/10) @quite
- logjob config presets (bike, walk, drive, battery, max presicion)
[#184](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-android/issues/184) @tmannn.24

### Changed
- increase zoom margin in map
[#177](https://gitlab.com/eneiluj/phonetrack-android/issues/177) @huste
- improve LoggerService, drop requestSingleUpdate, use requestLocationUpdates
[#179](https:...

apps.author: home-assistant
apps.name: Home Assistant
apps.changeLog:
## What's Changed
* Bump androidPlugin from 8.7.0 to 8.7.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4726
* Fix leading zero handling in toJsonType method by @blackhead1981 in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4721
* Add car speed sensor by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4722
* Add arrow to bottom sheet list items to indicate tappable by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4732
* Sensor descriptions and UI strings writing feedback by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4734
* Add a car range remaining sensor by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4733
* Bump activity-compose from 1.9.2 to 1.9.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4737
* Bump androidx.compose:compose-bom from 2024.09.03 to 2024.10.00 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4735
* Bump androidx.wear.tiles:tiles from 1.4.0 to 1.4.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4736
* Bump wear-protolayout from 1.2.0 to 1.2.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4738
* Bump com.google.android.gms:play-services-threadnetwork from 16.0.1 to 16.2.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4730
* Prevent crash due to any Improv scanning failure by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4740
* Bump androidx.navigation:navigation-compose from 2.8.2 to 2.8.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4742
* Bump androidx.health.connect:connect-client from 1.1.0-alpha09 to 1.1.0-alpha10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4744
* Avoid (s) in strings if possible by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4741
* Bump androidx.wear.compose:compose-material3 from 1.0.0-alpha26 to 1.0.0-alpha27 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4743
* Update change log week of 10/18 by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4745
* Correct sensor identification for car speed sensor by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4746
* Enable Health Connect again to retry for approval by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4731
* Bump com.google.firebase:firebase-bom from 33.4.0 to 33.5.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4748
* Hide widgets from automotive build and prevent intent registration too by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4751
* Add package name to health connect sensors, additional sensor tweaks by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4750
* Bump com.google.firebase:firebase-bom from 33.5.0 to 33.5.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4752
* Bump io.sentry:sentry-android from 7.15.0 to 7.16.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4753
* Bump actions/setup-java from 4.4.0 to 4.5.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4756
* Allow fan domain to be selected for android auto favorites list by @cwrogers in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4757
* Bump rexml from 3.3.6 to 3.3.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4762
* Bump lifecycle from 2.8.6 to 2.8.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4770
* Bump androidx.compose:compose-bom from 2024.10.00 to 2024.10.01 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4771
* Bump androidx.constraintlayout:constraintlayout from 2.1.4 to 2.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4769
* Bump androidx.core:core-ktx from 1.13.1 to 1.15.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4768
* Fix pipeline badge in the header of README.md by @marazmarci in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4773
* Bump androidx.wear.compose:compose-material3 from 1.0.0-alpha27 to 1.0.0-alpha28 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4772
* Improve wording, grammar, and punctuation in README.md by @marazmarci in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4774
* Don't reset work profile state on app restart and add 'intent only' update type by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4765
* Support behavior: textInput key on notification action for reply actions by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4763
* Add notification command for turning the flashlight on/off by @marazmarci in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4766
* Bump softprops/action-gh-release from 2.0.8 to 2.0.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4775
* Bump androidx.fragment:fragment-ktx from 1.8.4 to 1.8.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4778
* Bump androidx.work:work-runtime-ktx from 2.9.1 to 2.10.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4777
* Bump androidPlugin from 8.7.1 to 8.7.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4776
* Add heart rate sensor for Health Connect by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4784
* Fix some sensor configurations to be more precise by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4789
* Add several more health connect sensors by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4785
* Bump health services for security fix by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4791
* Bump com.android.tools:desugar_jdk_libs from 2.1.2 to 2.1.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4792
* Update change log week of 11/8 by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4794
* Bump softprops/action-gh-release from 2.0.9 to 2.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4800
* Added support for progress notifcations by @EarMaster in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4799
* Add device class to blood glucose sensor by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4801
* Make changes to allow health connect to work on Android 9 and higher by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4790
* Bump io.sentry:sentry-android from 7.16.0 to 7.17.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4806
* Bump androidx.navigation:navigation-compose from 2.8.3 to 2.8.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4814
* Bump paging from 3.3.2 to 3.3.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4815
* Use a red icon for Wear OS debug build entity complication to make it distinguishable by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4813
* Bump androidx.wear.compose:compose-material3 from 1.0.0-alpha28 to 1.0.0-alpha29 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4817
* Bump androidx.compose:compose-bom from 2024.10.01 to 2024.11.00 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4816
* Update some health connect sensor names to match Wear OS and to be more precise by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4802
* Update sensor frequency text to mention location is not included by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4821
* Update change log week of 11/15 by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4820
* Bump com.google.firebase:firebase-bom from 33.5.1 to 33.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4824
* Bump io.sentry:sentry-android from 7.17.0 to 7.18.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4827
* Skip ranker_group notifications as they are meaningless and system generated and prevent valid notification data from sending by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4822
* Catch all health connect exceptions so we dont crash by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4830
* Use translated channel name strings where possible to update them when language changes by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4833
* Add 10 more health connect sensors by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4803
* Add dialog before prompting for Improv permissions by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4837
* Bump com.google.android.gms:play-services-wearable from 18.2.0 to 19.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4838
* Add 5 more health connect sensors by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4836
* Update change log week of 11/22 by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4839
* String updates for translations by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4842
* Use the correct unit of measurement for device class volume for the hydration sensor by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4846
* Bump org.jlleitschuh.gradle.ktlint from 12.1.1 to 12.1.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4851
* Bump media3 from 1.4.1 to 1.5.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4850
* AAOS/Android Auto: Add a button to refresh the main screen entity list by @anstick in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4845
* Implement native Improv discovery with frontend flow by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4849
* Optimize sensor list performance by @jpelgrom in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4853
* Update change log week of 11/30 and temporarily disable health connect by @dshokouhi in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4860

## New Contributors
* @blackhead1981 made their first contribution in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4721
* @cwrogers made their first contribution in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4757
* @EarMaster made their first contribution in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4799
* @anstick made their first contribution in https://github.com/home-assistant/android/pull/4845

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/home-assistant/android/compare/2024.10.3...2024.12.1
